bwwExcerpt: Opera queens can sniff all they want about Tyne Daly not having the right kind of chops to play Maria Callas in "Master Class," Terrence McNally's 1995 tribute to the flamboyant opera diva as she neared the end of her life. But while the dynamic Daly might not possess the air of self-dramatizing tristesse that hovered over Callas after her blazing career came to an end, Daly brings something better to the character -- a sense of vulnerable humanity that makes her courage to survive all the more
